title: Eclectic handwritten packaging fonts
content:
Anyone know the two at the bottom? I see the first one is Thirsty Script.

comments.content: WITH VEGETABLES: hard to state if it's hand-drawn or not as there are many variations on stroke thickness and the 3 /E look different (OpenType alternates?)
